subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Running back Ahmad Bradshaw signed a four-year contract worth a reported $18 million. But Osi Umenyiora continued to voice his displeasure over his contract.
snippet: Running back Ahmad Bradshaw signed a four-year contract worth a reported $18 million. But Osi Umenyiora continued to voice his displeasure over his contract.
